short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inuyasha Wallpaper turn new tab to custom Inuyasha background. Inuyasha wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Enjoy a shuffled Inuyasha wallpaper every time you open a new tab.  
2. Randomize or favorite Inuyasha backgrounds through the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Use a convenient Google-powered search bar.  
4. Quickly access your emails and social media accounts.  
5. Automatically display the current date and time.  
6. Write down tasks or reminders with the "New Note" feature.  
7. Effortlessly access your most-visited websites.  
8. Manage bookmarks with easy access.  
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for quick navigation.  
10. Instantly access Google apps.  
11. Explore more themes with just a click.  
12. Share content easily on social media.  
13. Download wallpapers with one click.  
14. Access and play games quickly.  
15. Add fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks to your Inuyasha new tab.
